name: Asian Nourish Bowl
description: Tofu is an awesome and affordable vegetarian option that adds a satisfying, healthy protein to your bowl. This bowl is quick to assemble and a perfect on-the-go lunch. Shake up your veggie lineup by opting for popular Asian favourites like crisp bok choy, vibrant carrots, or even add a unique twist with bamboo shoots (find them canned, typically in the international aisle).

ingredients.name: cooked rice, quinoa, or rice noodles
mixture of sliced raw Asian-style veggies
Tofu Fries
ingredients.additionalInstruction: prepared with Sesame Ginger Dressing Mix

ingredients.name: Fajita Seasoning
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or Epicure seasoning of your choice

ingredients.name: low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: Place cooked grain into a serving bowl.
Arrange veggies, slaw, and tofu on top.
Drizzle with dressing and garnish with Poke Bowl Topper Blend or sesame seeds.
tips: Make a big batch of dressing and marinate the tofu before coating.
This bowl is also great with Rotisserie Chicken, grilled beef or salmon.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
